trans-unit.source: Creates the theme-specific look for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> elements. A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> defines the appearance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> elements.
The actual appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system.
The properties of this class allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to set the appearance based on the current theme.

In XAML usage, a BulletChrome object element can also have child content, which can be a single <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property.
## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace.
Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the brush used to fill the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
The brush used to fill the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome.Background*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush used to draw the outer border of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
The brush used to draw the outer border of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome.BorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the thickness used to draw the outer border of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>.
This property is not available in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] theme.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
The thickness used to draw the border of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome.BorderThickness*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> is checked.
This property only applies when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
If the object used for the bullet supports an `IsThreeState` property, and the value of that property is `true`, then a value of `null` is potentially user-settable.
Otherwise, the value of IsChecked cannot be set to `null` by user action, but it can be set that way in markup or code.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`| (however, this property might not be set in all themes)| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ```

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> is checked; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> is not checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome.IsChecked*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> has round corners.
When set to `false`, the corners are square.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> has round corners; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome.IsRound*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> appears as if the mouse is over it.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`| (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> appears as if the mouse is over it; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome.RenderMouseOver*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> appears pressed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`| (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> appears pressed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome.RenderPressed*> dependency property.
To be added.
